column2:
'Studio'
'The Azure Machine Learning studio 2 offers multiple authoring experiences depending'
'on the type of project and the level of your past ML experience, without having to install'
'anything.'
'.'
'Noteooks: write and run your own code in managed Jupyter Noteook servers'
'that are directly integrated in the studio.'
'\xc2\x7 Visualize run metrics: analyze and optimize your experiments with visualization.'
